pullrequest.title: Allow putting GUI headers in src/gui and move resources into src/gui

content.raw:
Yeah, doing `../gui/Gui.hh` works, but seeing that our other libraries have `ign.cc` in `src`:

```
./ign-fuel-tools/src/ign.cc
./ign-launch/src/ign.cc
./ign-gazebo/src/cmd/ign.cc
./ign-gui/src/ign.cc
./ign-msgs/src/ign.cc
./sdformat/src/ign.cc
./ign-transport/src/ign.cc
```
I'd vote for the second option.
content.html:
Yeah, doing ../gui/Gui.hh works, but seeing that our other libraries have ign.cc in src:
